1.0.1.name: wordpress/hide-categories
1.0.1.description:
Hide one o more categories when you use the_category tag or wp_list_categories tag. No exclude post, but only hide a category name in template view. Example? You use a category called "featured" in your template but you don't want it see? Use Hide Categories

Thanks to infocube for the plugin's idea
